articles.title: ‘Hates humanity’, Elon Musk slams George Soros for eroding ‘societal cohesion’ | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Elon Musk openly criticizes George Soros, accusing him of contributing to the deterioration of societal cohesion and eroding the fabric of civilization.
